Title: Enacts the safe housing transfer for domestic violence victims act
Summary: Enacts the safe housing transfer for domestic violence victims act; ensures safe housing transfers for domestic violence victims in public and private housing; requires landlord response within seven days of a relocation request.
LawCode: Amd ยง227-c, RP L; amd ยง14, Pub Hous L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law and the public housing law, in relation to ensuring safe housing transfers for domestic violence victims
